data.title: The 30 best Catholic high schools in Upstate NY, ranked for the new school year
data.meta_description: See which Catholic high schools offer students the best education.
data.text:
Some parents prefer to give their children a traditional, Catholic school education, and some children are more comfortable in a faith-based learning environment. Even some non-religious families send their kids to Catholic schools, particularly if the standard of education at the school is better than the local public school system.

These 30 private Catholic high schools are the best that can be found in Upstate New York, according to the 2020 school year ranking from neighborhood analysis website Niche.com.

Using key factors like college readiness, teacher quality and experience, tuition and more, Niche grades every Catholic high school in the country, and ranks the best of the best.

Below, you can find the 30 highest-scoring Catholic high schools all across Upstate New York, as well as graduation rates, student to teacher ratio and other information for each school, updated for 2020. Every school below received a grade of B+ or better. For a full report card on each high school, click the name of the district.
